cells.data: Notes are only useful if you can find them quickly. Quiver's full-text search is based on Search Kit, the same technology used to power Spotlight on your mac. That’s how Quiver can search through thousands of notes in a blink of an eye.
You can search by keyword or #tag.
You can also search within a note (⌘F). Use ⌘G to find the next occurrence, and ⇧⌘G to find the previous occurence.
